text: The four calligraphy masters from the Song Dynasty is the general name of the four greatest calligrapher of Song dynasty. They are Su Shi, Huang Tingjian, Mi Fei and Cai Xiang(formly Cai Jing). These four are famous calligraphers in the Song Dynasty and have the highest achievements, so they are called The four calligraphy masters from the Song Dynasty. Category:Chinese culture Category:Calligraphy
title: The four calligraphy masters from the Song Dynasty
